  • Uses of IEventListener in com.university.elements.boxes

    Classes in com.university.elements.boxes that implement IEventListener
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    Chest
    Represents a chest in the game that contains a random item The chest can be opened by the player, and once opened, the item is added to the current room's inventory
    class 
    MimicChest
    Represents a mimic chest in the game that attacks the player when opened

  • Uses of IEventListener in com.university.elements.traps

    Classes in com.university.elements.traps that implement IEventListener
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    CutieCat
    Represents a special trap: CutieCat, which immobilizes the player until it is fed.
    class 
    MadScientists
    Represents the "Mad Scientists" trap in the game The trap involves a group of scientists who trap the player by talking constantly about their experiments The player becomes stuck in the room until they use a specific strategy to escape
    class 
    Trap
    Represents a generic trap in the game that can immobilize the player The trap can be escaped by using specific strategies or items
